metadata.title: CVE-2016-6175 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Eval injection vulnerability in php-gettext 1.0.12 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via a crafted plural forms header.

notes.note: ebarretto> Still not solution as of 2018-12-07

criterions.comment: php-gettext package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.12-1').
